alert.note: Alert for Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 1:14AM CDT until June 06 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NOBLE AND NORTH CENTRAL PAYNE COUNTIES... At 113 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Sooner Lake to 3 miles southeast of Perry, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Perry, Morrison, Glencoe, Billings, Red Rock, Marland, Lake Mcmurtry, Sooner Lake and Ceres. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
